channel.title: Look and Feel JFrame?
channel.description:
im trying to add a lookandfeel to my math application which i did but my JMenu disappeared and i cant seem to get it to come back?
i had to rename a few things to get the JFrame to apear so that might of cuased it to block out my JFs class

item.title: Look and Feel JFrame?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

[quote=“Taharok, post:5, topic:181509”]Firstly, if you are using multiple action listeners, why not just make your current class extend it and reference toward the ‘this’ keyword instead of re-instantiating it over and over again. Implement the ActionListener interface, override the actionPerformed() method, and then add ‘this’ class to the buttons as action listeners.

And for the menu thing, add it to the frame instance in DesktopTest, not JFs.[/quote]

kk i think i might redo the JMenus just to make it alittle easier instead of working off it

Read full topic

item.title: Look and Feel JFrame?
item.dc:creator: @mod_taharok Taharok
item.description:
@mod_taharok wrote:

Firstly, if you are using multiple action listeners, why not just make your current class extend it and reference toward the ‘this’ keyword instead of re-instantiating it over and over again. Implement the ActionListener interface, override the actionPerformed() method, and then add ‘this’ class to the buttons as action listeners.

And for the menu thing, add it to the frame instance in DesktopTest, not JFs.

Read full topic

item.title: Look and Feel JFrame?
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

I suggest renaming things to the way they were before. It really is quite easy to add LookAndFeelDecorated with that one line.

Read full topic

item.title: Look and Feel JFrame?
item.dc:creator: @openice123 openice123
item.description:
@openice123 wrote:

[quote=“Tico135, post:2, topic:181509”]So I take it you were trying to add:

JFrame.setDefaultLookAndFeelDecorated(true);

Let me see your source code.[/quote]
yep and sorry lil tired atm >.<
by source code you mean the whole thing right?

and im re reading this tut
http://java.sun.com/docs/books/tutorial/uiswing/components/menu.html

umm anyways here the whole thing

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars
